meta_description: Agora helps people overcome disagreement and find consensus, for more democratic and efficient decision-making.
hero_tagline: Agora helps people overcome disagreement and find consensus, for more democratic and efficient decision-making.
partners_intro: We partner with leading organizations to democratize participation:
facilitators_description: Agora is an open-source, AI-powered facilitation tool that helps you run large-scale consultations, surface consensus, and make better collective decisions.
facilitators_feature_polis: Find out what divides and unites participants
facilitators_feature_auth: Email, phone number, event ticket, digital ID, or Web3 logins
facilitators_feature_demographics: Add a short demographic survey as part of the process
citizens_description: Participate in meaningful dialogues that shape collective action. See where people agree and disagree on complex, divisive topics.
usecases_web3_examples: Opinion mapping and conflict resolution before voting|Decentralized, verifiable, & bot-proof
usecases_events_tagline: Turn events into powerful insight engines
usecases_events_examples: Hybrid, online, or in person events|Conferences|Streaming or podcast
usecases_businesses_examples: Focus groups, user research|Strategic brainstorming|Employee engagement
testimonial_emily_quote: Agora is beautiful, simple, and intuitive. We have to walk people through other deliberative tools but it's very easy to show them how Agora works.
testimonial_nicholas_quote: Agora made the event feel lively and interactive with participants actively sharing thoughts and reacting in real time, while the live analytics allowed trends to emerge clearly. It really brought the conversation to life and fostered a collaborative and inclusive atmosphere.
testimonial_nicholas_org: UN Department of Political and Peacebuilding Affairs
testimonial_jeanlou_quote: We need digital platforms make cross-party consensus visible and politically legitimate. The visibility of consensus can put pressure on politicians to move beyond partisan politics and act on what unites us.
casestudy_bloquonstout_title: Agora used during France's national strike to transform frustration into shared democratic demands
casestudy_tech4nature_title: Mapping consensus on blockchain in conservation at Tech4Nature summit
casestudy_unesco_mil_title: Listening at scale: a pilot with UNESCO's MIL Alliance during MIL Week
pricing_subtitle: From free community use to full-service participatory projects
mission_quote: We build Agora for human-flourishing and sustainable peace.

blog_description: Impact stories, news, and practical guides for using Agora
